article_title: ProMedica set to manage CHC after Feb. 1

article_metadata.description: COLDWATER — The goal now is to transfer management of the Community Health Center of Branch County to ProMedica Health Systems of Toledo by Feb. 1, after attorneys for Branch County required changes to agreements approved by Branch County commissioners in December. Jan. 1 had been the previous date.Hospital CEO Randy DeGroot said that because of the holidays, legal counsel were not able to finalize documents on tax exempt bonds which are to remain after a sale to ProMedica by 2018.After
article_metadata.author: Don Reid
